title: Create model.go with Bubble Tea scaffold
description:
Create internal/tui/model.go with the basic Bubble Tea scaffold. Include:
- Model struct with minimal fields (width, height, ready, keys, help)
- Init() returning nil cmd
- Update() handling tea.WindowSizeMsg and tea.KeyMsg
- View() returning placeholder string
- NewModel() constructor function
- Force COLORTERM=truecolor in init()

Follow ticks pattern of single-file monolithic model. This is the foundation all other ticks build on.
